case.state: A game of poker should help me with my concentration.
What the heck? You look so much like me!
Hey your name is the same as- ugh!
(Something tells me this girl is bad news...)
Hey doesn't your dad own that burger chain? I love that place!
Shit, uh, be careful with that gun, ok?
I shouldn't be surprised with guns since Naoto uses one but that looks like bad news.
From what I've seen in pictures Scotland reminds me a bit of Inaba. It's neat to play against someone from there.
Hey your name is the same as- ugh!
Gosh, it's so quiet in here. I kinda like it.
Those glasses; have you visited the TV world too?
♫ Now I face out, I hold out, I reach out to the truth of my life, seeking to seize on the whole moment to now break away... ♪
Look at us! We could form our own basketball team!
W-wait! Why am I the only girl here?
Let's step on up to the plate!
I never back down from a challenge so bring it on! Hwataa!
I'm just glad this isn't another one of Yosuke's tricks.
The body is a temple. I will hone its mind.
C'mon, gimme ~cards.text~ card~cards.ifplural(s|)~ already!
~Cards.text~!! Hurry before she gets dirty ideas!
Let's see... I'll exchange ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
This should be enough.
You know what to do dealer!
I just need ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
All I need is a chance.. ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~!
Uhhh. ~cards.text~ card~cards.ifplural(s|)~.
How about ~cards.text~ card~cards.ifplural(s|)~?
I'm starting to get the hang of this.
Quick draw!
Hey, Yuno, you’re great at card games, right? Is this hand good?
Phew, still in it.
Just goes to show that I don't go down that easily!
It'll take more than that to bring me down!
I need a miracle...
Perfect! Just as I planned.
Perfect!
Will this be enough?
♫ Every day's great at your Junes! ♪ Aw damn it it's stuck in my head again.
Hm, if Naoto were here right now, she might have said something like "What are you even worrying about? Your hand is perfectly calculated."
Nice! Gotta hand it to you, dealer.
Thanks, dealer! I owe you some steak for this.
Yes!
You know, you remind me of our navigator.
Nice hair! Short hair feels good doesn't it?
This is fine. It should only get better from here.
You know about Aiya's specialty? Meat buns. She packs them with fresh meat grinded from the nearby farms.
The TV Room in Junes is often so barren that we could have played there as well.
This should be good enough to win, but I can't be too sure.
After this maybe I'll hit up Junes.
Huh.
(I wonder if any of these guys have a worse hand.)
Okay, I can make this work.
It's like studying for an exam. You just need to not fail.
I could sure go for some filet mignon right now..
Hey, wait! He didn't say "Uno"!
Not good! Protect me, Tomoe!
Just girls? That's fine, I bathed with Yukiko and Rise before.
Don't think that I'm a guy just because my hair is short like yours.
No way!
Could it get any worse?
Now hold on a minute...
Where's Rise when you need her?
It's bad enough that I have to bare my underwear to the world.
Yeah, yeah, rub it in.
Are you kidding? I can't let this be the end!
Oh shit...
I can't even bear to look...
I'm totally screwed now!
I can't afford to lose now!
There must be some way I can distract my opponent!
Well isn't that fantastic.
I'm gonna have Aya bring some meat. How do you guys want it prepared?
Never really expected card game players to be very fit anyway.
Wow, I've seen some pretty good dancing back in high school but this is something else!
Hearing this makes me want to dance all night again!
It's your birthday? Come meet us at Junes! We'll give you a nice treat!
You're an expert on technology aren't you, Futaba? Maybe you have a better idea than I do.

♫Let's go, Neo Featherman! Fighting to save the world! Dan dan dananan... ♪
Ah, sorry, I was trying to distract myself to stay positive.
Honestly, without Tomoe I'd probably be toast. It's not that I can't hold my own but the shadows are ruthless.
My weapon? I always just use my fists. And maybe I'll have Tomoe help out, but mostly my fists... and legs...
The mark of the dragon! No? Maybe that's just a Neo Featherman thing.
When in doubt, play the soundtrack from Trial of the Dragon. I guarantee it'll get you rolling!
Yeah, if you want technology answers, you may want to ask Yosuke.
Great, it's King Moron's homeroom all over again.
Maybe you could work out a bit more, but I think it's cute! Don't be afraid of it.
Your name is actually Yusuke? My bad, I mistook you for someone else.
You're a police officer? That's awesome! I hope I can be like you some day.
Our leader became pretty famous on the internet for his dance accompanied by sax music.
I gotta show Yukiko the ropes at some point. Don't be surprised if you fall over her ladylike charms when I bring her here.
Oh yeah, King Moron is what we call our homeroom teacher Mr. Morooka. He really is a moron.
The world you fight in sounds oddly similar to our shadow world. But if you don't have personas, what could you be using?
Doesn't seem like the Midnight Channel will be on tonight.
I sense some powerful energy. Another persona user?
So is there a girl like Yukiko where you come from?
I used to play trumpet once! Why don't we do a duet together?
Hardy har har...
Yeah yeah, rub it in.
I almost got away with it too! You and your meddling hands.
Again? Fine, have it your way.
What am I doing? I need to somehow change my strategy.
Can't be all bad, since you guys showed yours first.
Oh, my turn? No problem!
This is starting to get tense! I'm on the edge of my seat!
Well, it was going to be my turn sooner or later.
My turn, huh? Just watch.
Kept me waiting long enough.. not that I was looking forward to it or anything.
After this I won't be taking any more off... I hope.
Great, where can I put my shirt without it getting dirty?
Don't feel too bad about it. I would have done it sooner, but that was against the rules.
I lost! So that means...
Well, it was going to be my turn sooner or later.
Oh geez, I don't have anything smaller to take off.
I have... no comment.
Huh? Are you sure? That soon?
You're saying I have to show you my WHAT!?
No way!
When training, it's important to keep it slow but not so slow that you don't go anywhere.
I lost! So that means...
Great, where can I put my bra without it getting dirty?
How is that even possible?
And after such a good hand too!
I thought I was in the clear!
Are you guys rigging the deck?
Seriously?
No, this can't be!
You owe me 10 meat buns for this!
How stupid do you think I am?
Maybe I really am this stupid, geez..
My mom did say I needed to work on my brain.
Not even a meat bun can cheer me up..
Dammit, how can I be a police officer if I can't even deduce the perfect hand?
It feels weird doing this in front of you, Sayaka.
See? If I can do it you can too.
Moon, I swear to god...
Kinda crazy how our Personas' arcana are the same aren't they?
I still can't believe you guys work with a talking cat thing.
Shouldn't make a difference whether my shoes are off right?
You know, I actually wore this during a beauty pageant at school.
I don't usually have my socks on when doing kung fu anyway...
Dammit, I was hoping it wouldn't come to this.
At least I didn't bring my Neo Fetherman tank.
One time I slept in my jacket during a camping trip. Normally the tents are split by gender but Kanji took over my tent.
This is it. No turning back.
I can't believe I'm really doing this...
Look, if you have a problem just tell me.
Only one way to find out! Let's go, Tomoe!
Great, now there's sand all over me.
Now I see what the appeal is..
But maybe it's not too farfetched since we have a talking bear on our team.
Don't even think about it boys.
Maybe I should have gone with boxers.
We were almost caught by our chaperone King Moron if not for Yosuke sweet talking his way out of it.
Reminds me of the time we ran through Kanji's bathhouse.
Alright, so far so good.
I didn't win, of course, but it was worth it after seeing Yu and the boys cross dressing.
Could these guys at least turn up the heat?
I-It's not like this is anything out of the ordinary, right?
Maybe I should have thought twice before I took off my shoes in a place like this.
Yosuke's lucky he isn't here...
There! I have no more to hide.
So this is how boys feel at the beach.
Bring it on, Yosu- I mean Yusuke!
Looks like you're up, Ryuji! As the athlete of your group, you gotta give it your all and not look back!
For someone with a pirate persona you sure aren't liking these dirty things.
Quite an interesting dialect there, Brock. Certainly not from one of those smaller scale areas like Inaba.
I remember seeing Kanji do this. Not that I'd want to remember anyway.
I mean, if you want to I guess...
Score one for me!
And I live to see another round...
Whenever you're ready!
Wow, you suck at this!
If you want to survive, you have to give it your all.
Hey, no! Bad idea! Bad idea!
How many cards did you swap? Actually, nevermind that now.
(They just have to keep knocking each other out.)
Remember your training, ~name~!
Whatever you do, don't cross the line. I can tell when you get there.
No touching OK?
Don't be scared now, ~name~.
Not like I have anything to lose at this point. I'm ready to let loose... That sounded better in my head.
Just pretend we're all in our underwear. Oh, wait a minute...
You should have done it while I still had clothes on!
Did someone lose? Hell if I can notice.
Nice! Take it off, ~name~!
Don't hold back, ~name~!
Well? We're waiting.
Oh no, anyone but her...
As long as it's not Yosuke..
So, is anyone going to stop them or...
Yeah, don't mention it...
This early? Are you serious?!
That's gotta be against the rules!
No matter how disgusted I am I can't help but admit it: you're actually really pretty! Still not as much as Yukiko though.
Don't even think about it!
Looks like you're down to your chest, Haru. Are you excited?
(Haru's so ladylike, almost like Yukiko rubbed off on her... oh god I think I have a type.)
She's insane! Who let her in here?
You're a navi, right? I'm a little jealous of your skills.
C'mon officer! Do something!
Want some help, ~name~?
If anyone messes with you I'll be sure to kick their ass!
Better luck next time!
Here's my victory pose!
Your turn! Show us what you're made of.
Don't worry, I won't look if you don't want me to.
Remember: Don't think.. feel.
Tough break, ~name~.
No touching OK?
Don't be scared now, ~name~.
Not like I have anything to lose at this point. I'm ready to let loose... That sounded better in my head.
Just pretend we're all in our underwear. Oh, wait a minute...
As much as I appreciate Rise's words of encouragement, it's rather refreshing not needing to hear her after every battle.
How many cards did you swap? Actually, nevermind that now.
You should have done it while I still had clothes on!
A tie! What are the odds of that?
A tie? So what happens now?
Hey, watch it!
Are you trying to get us killed?
Now you're just playing dirty, ~name~.
Oh, come on! After how far we've come?
Maybe I underestimated you, ~name~,
Pssh...
Well at least someone's got dignity.
Not taking off your ~clothing~ first? I need to do that.
Your ~clothing~ looks nice.
You're only taking off your ~clothing~?
I've never been a fashion expert so I can't really comment.
Not going to lie, I'm pretty pissed.
I'm not the happiest right now, but I need to be able to control my emotions.
You sure are full of energy! I wish I could emulate that.
They say slow and steady wins the race, don't they?
Insulting! I feel like I'm on the Midnight Channel.
You owe me for this.
I'll forgive you if you buy me steak.
Scared? Don't be. You'll only be delaying the inevitable.
Um, yeah let's move on.
All part of my training.
Phew, I was worryied you were going to take things too quickly.
Hurry up and start the next round!
That's it, then? Nothing else?
I should have expected that.
Protect me, Tomoe!
Everyone, stand behind me!
Eh, don't tell Rise I said that.
Who needs weapons when you can fight with your bare hands? Hwataa!
Guess I can't complain.
Well at least someone's got dignity.
Your ~clothing~ looks nice.
Just you wait. I'll get you further than that.
Finally ditching your ~clothing~?
Are you really dragging things out like this?
How stupid do you think we are?
Smart move. I can't stay mad forever.
I'm not the happiest right now, but I need to be able to control my emotions.
OK, maybe I'm a little pissed.
You're only taking off your ~clothing~?
I've never been a fashion expert so I can't really comment.
You just wanted to see me naked didn't you?
You owe me filet mignon for this!
Scared? Don't be. You'll only be delaying the inevitable.
I'll forgive you if you buy me steak.
Um, yeah let's move on.
All part of my training.
Phew, I was worryied you were going to take things too quickly.
Hurry up and start the next round!
That's it, then? Nothing else?
I should have expected that.
Do personas have long backstories like that? Mine came when I defeated my shadow inside a TV.
Shield your eyes, girls!
Let's face it. You were removing that sooner or later.
We're finally getting somewhere, ~name~.
It's about time.
We've gotten this far. I can't really complain.
Can't you do more than that, ~name~?
About damn time.
Your ~clothing~, huh? Nice.
Your ~clothing~, gotcha.
You're trying to outlast me, but I'll wear you down, ~name~.
You've underestimated my training, ~name~!
With how slow you're going I should order some filet.
~Clothing~? Is that it?
Just goes to show I can never rely on boys to give me stuff to work with.
You need to work your legs more! A little kung fu should do the trick!
There's only so many witty remarks I can make.
What to do now...
Now that you've lost those clothes, your body should be more free to move around!
We're moving on, right?
I like my odds.
At this rate, I'll have a good chance at winning!
You know, maybe Yosuke would have done that too.
Well, there's always next round.
Next round, do us a favor and take off something better.
Probably doesn't matter. I'm already focused on the next round.
(Yawn) I forgot, when did I last eat?
Show us more of that, next round.
If this was a race, you'd be in a pathetic placement!
Isn't that what you're supposed to do? Who takes off one sock at a time?
So it works like your persona? I can see that.
What's up with your clothes anyway? Is it some weird shadow world gimmick?
Just thinking about walking in heels makes me cringe.
Don't worry about it. We're in a locker room after all.
Don't worry about it. Just pretend it's the girls locker room.
Let's face it. You were removing that sooner or later.
We're finally getting somewhere, ~name~.
It's about time.
About damn, time.
I mean you do have to lose the clothes before getting to the good stuff.
Your ~clothing~, gotcha.
Yeah that's it. You're almost there...
You've underestimated my training, ~name~!
With how slow you're going I should order some filet.
We've gotten this far. I can't really complain.
Can't you do more than that, ~name~?
~Clothing~? Is that it?
Screw the hoodies. Just get a nice jacket like mine.
This is getting tense. I better brace myself! Tomoe!!
You could do what I do and wrap it around your waist! Then again, it probably messes with your ladylike charms.
You won't be losing on my watch! Wait, what am I saying?
Maybe she isn't so bad after all.
Look out for that shadow! Oh, wait, it's leaving.
Next round, do us a favor and take off something better.
Probably doesn't matter. I'm already focused on the next round.
(Yawn) I forgot, when did I last eat?
The sooner we start the next round the sooner I can get dinner!
Yosuke owes Yu and I an all you can eat buffet at Junes tonight.
Show us more of that, next round.
You're such a tease!
There's only so many witty remarks I can make.
What to do now...
Now that you've lost those clothes, your body should be more free to move around!
We're moving on, right?
I like my odds.
At this rate, I'll have a good chance at winning!
You know, maybe Yosuke would have done that too.
Well, there's always next round.
Next round, do us a favor and take off something better.
Probably doesn't matter. I'm already focused on the next round.
(Yawn) I forgot, when did I last eat?
Maybe I'll get Yosuke to enter you in a beauty pageant.
It can't bother me if I look away...
Time sure flies. We already got to your ~clothing~.
(I never expected ~name~ to look good almost-naked...)
Hey, take your time if you need to.
What was I so worried about again?
Looks like you're running out of options, ~name~.
It's the point of no return!
Just a day at the beach... Yeah, I'll go with that!
(Remember your training, Chie. You're here to improve your concentration.)
Not bad, but the game's still going.
Not bad, but you're almost out of options.
I have... no comment.
If I'm going to be a police officer, I'll have to get used to this sight. I may be responsible for stripping suspects down and searching for drugs.
I've got my eye on you, ~name~.
Nice view...
Now that's more like it!
You know what's next right?
(What could she be talking about?)
We're not going to jail for this are we?
(If I see a wire that's my cue to bounce!)
Moon, I swear to god...
It's the point of no return!
Maybe if I take it off like that, Yukiko will be impressed!
(I never expected ~name~ to look good almost-naked...)
What was I so worried about again?
Looks like you're running out of options, ~name~.
It can't bother me if I look away...
Time sure flies. We already got to your ~clothing~.
Hey, take your time if you need to.
Should I look? You trust me, right?
It's your funeral dude.
Just pretend we're in the locker room together!
H-huh? What's gotten into you Haru?
Wait, Haru? What on earth is up with you?
O-okay, let's calm down for a second now.
Is this the Midnight Channel? Am I seeing your shadow, Haru?
She's a persona user! Wait, actually... never mind.
Hey, don't look at me. I'm no expert.
So you do have gym class! I hope you're taking advantage of it.
Now that's more like it!
You know what's next right?
(Remember your training, Chie. You're here to improve your concentration.)
Not bad, but the game's still going.
Not bad, but you're almost out of options.
I have... no comment.
If I'm going to be a police officer, I'll have to get used to this sight. I may be responsible for stripping suspects down and searching for drugs.
I've got my eye on you, ~name~.
Nice view...
Rise had no problem getting in her bikini for that commercial. You could learn a lot from her.
Everyone, get down behind me!
Tomoe, take out that rocket- oh, too late...
You actually like this stuff?
H-hey! My chest is way better than these guys'!
W-well maybe I should show you some kung fu movies! It's not supposed to be a problem.
It's a good thing you didn't. Otherwise I may have galactic punted you out of here!
People go shirtless in kung fu movies all the time.
If you think this will arouse me think again.
Good timing, ~name~.
You were? Why didn't you say so? We should go work out together!
With a body like that, I can't imagine why you'd need to use your weapon. It's not like you're fighting shadows or anything.
I see what's going on. You and Futaba should really get some sun.
What the heck happened? Are you a shut in or something?
You need to eat more meat!
See? Just like in Trial of the Dragon.
H-hey! That's gotta be against the rules! Someone get him some pants!
There's a guy stripping and you're only concerned about the game? I gotta respect you for that.
I don't care how big it is, just do it before I punt someone!
Since I still have this much clothing on, I'd consider this a good spot.
Now I just need to not go on a bad streak.
As if this couldn't get any worse.
Oh thank goodness, it's barely noticeable.
Does size really matter?
Well they say never judge a bird by its wings. Or was it fruit by its tree?
I don't even know how to respond to that!
At least you're being modest about it.
Just right, like the story of the three boars. Or was it the three birds?
I didn't know what else to expect. Do I look like someone who's seen a dick?
Mind helping me out here? My hands could use a rest.
Oh, um, nice dick I guess.
It's always the quiet ones.
What on earth? That thing would tear me apart!
Do dicks grow the same way as our other muscles? You must be good at working out if that's true.
Arrows, guns, whatever! Bring them on!
What would I want to do with her?
I mean yeah she's kinda cute but she's all yours! I don't need anything from her.
T-that's crazy! I have Yukiko after all.
Hey Ryuji, doesn't one of your teammates have a bike? Let's have her ship this perv out of here.
Hiding what? Are you saying there's more than meets the eye?
Yosuke may be the biggest perv I know, but don't feel proud about coming in second!
What? You never bathed together? Then again, it's a good thing you didn't.
Can't say I didn't expect it.
I've seen boobs before haven't I? So why am I getting aroused?
You know you can't stall on my watch!
Think of it as advanced training, ~name~!
Here we go, moment of truth!
Show us what you're working with.
You sure are a handful, aren't you?
I mean you're right about one thing; bras really are uncomfortable. I never wear mine when training.
Your small size must be a sign of good exercise. Keep it up!
You've still got a way to go there.
Well they say never judge a bird by its wings. Or was it fruit by its tree?
If boobs grow like muscles I can see some room for improvement. Then again mine are still smallish and I'm perfectly fine.
They say big is truth, but being small has its perks too... Did that even make sense?
You know what the best part about a flat chest is? It doesn't get in the way of your workout!
This is nuts! I've never seen so much jiggle in my life!
Just right, like the story of the three boars. Or was it the three birds?
There's something normal about the situation here.
It's like looking into a mirror!
Looking good, ~name~!
Nice chest, ~name~!
I can't hold back any longer!
Could I feel them?
Ever think about transferring to Yasogami?
I can't believe anyone can get by with a chest that big.
Don't those hurt when they get hit?
There's so big I just wanna bury my face in them!
Teddie would sure get jealous.
I- wow.. I wonder if I should tell the rest of the team.
No one on the investigation team makes too big a deal about these, but I might end up telling them anyway...
Some people get flustered about their big size. I say you're valid no matter how big it is! Don't be afraid to show off!
You've really been watching your body. I respect that!
If you need help, I have some workout routines tailored specifically for you!
Will you cut that out?!
Damn, I was hoping it wouldn't have come to this.
D-don't be ridiculous!
I mean I guess they're nice but that doesn't excuse anything.
We go pretty well together, don't you think, Haru?
M-me? Envious? Haha, what makes you say that, Haru?
Thanks Haru. You've given me the courage to keep going!
(I'm starting to remember something Yu said. Something about facing myself?)
We've really gotten to this point?
At least this was before I had to show my thighs.
(What am I doing? Why can't I look away?)
Glad to have you, ~name~.
My concentration is really being tested now...
Nothing else to do but to win!
I mean, I've seen my own plenty of times so it's none of my concern.
(That's it! All this time I've been concerned about copying Yukiko and Haru that I forgot about just being myself!)
Shouldn't there be some synonyms, or whatever that's called? Not that I would know.
You see that? I knew you could do it, ~name~.
With you guys being here, I feel like we're in a soccer team's changing room.
I was hoping I wouldn't be the only one who shaves.
Sorry, I didn't mean to stare.
Good vibes all around right?
Still OK? Let me get you a power bar or something.
Oh, wow.
Why did I expect a whole fireworks show with it?
What could I possibly do with that?
Don't be afraid to show off! It's what we're here for, right?
(Yawn) Are we almost done? It's ramen night at Junes.
You know what they say, the more the marry- I mean merrier.
It takes a lot of strength to do what you just did.
Just call me Chie. We're all friends here right?
Your shadow isn't here is it? Whatever you do, don't say "you're not me".
I thought you were some kind of card game wizard.
Wait really? No wonder you were so nervous.
That's OK, Chi! Don't let your gender stop you from being who you really are!
I guess I shouldn't be too surprised since Naoto was in a similar boat.
Don't worry, Haru! I'll shield your eyes!
Guess the luck of the Chariot graced me today!
~name~ is masturbating and I still have a comfortable lead! I'm starting to think I can win this thing!
Well, see you later!
If I keep doing what I've been doing, I might end up winning the whole thing!
Why does everyone waste so much energy in this?
Finally someone to join me..
Just do what I did before.
This time I am absolutely not going to- oh forget it.
I can't lose focus now! Not when I'm on the verge of winning!
I'm not ashamed to admit it but I did see this in a movie once. Not a kung fu movie, one of those late night slice of life films.
This must be what Yosuke and the boys do in the bathroom.
Are you okay, ~name~?
Seeing him stroke his.. stick is making me imagine that thing grinding against me...!
Hey, watch where you aim, dork!
Are you trying to tell me something?
Did you know about this the whole time, Ryuji?
N-no way- I mean, please! I could use the practice.
You're lucky I'm not in a position to kick your ass.
Not only does this train my body to be patient, but I get to learn from ~name~ going before me.
Does this even need to be part of the game?
I feel like being naked is punishment enough.
I mean it's not like we were gambling money away.
Goodness... what a scene we've created.
Now let's see if she does anything differently...
You get going! I'll hold them off!
This is nuts! I can't believe I'm masturbating with her!
Who's this instructor you keep bringing up? The only person I know of like that is Yu, our leader.
Look out for those shadows, Hermoine!
(If I look and nothing happens, my composure will improve! I better watch.)
It's too late to distract myself with a meat bun. Might as well enjoy it.
And off she goes...
How did this... never mind.
Oh, that was your own doing? My bad.
The way her boobs stretch and squish as she masturbates is so hypnotizing...
Is it considered my type if I like big boobs? That's just expected isn't it?
(D-don't think, feel. Dammit this is harder than I thought!)
Hey, you hanging in there OK?
I guess it's either this or a fight with the shadows.
How do you like it, ~target~?
Since this is like a workout, you need to keep your own pace.
Remember, you gotta clean up after yourself.
Keep going, ~name~.
Consider this your warm up before the real training begins.
You're doing great, ~target~!
Breath in through your nose and out through your mouth.
I wonder if there's a non sexual way to work out the same muscles.
I should probably take this time to get a pork bun- oh wait, never mind. We gotta start the next round.
Is it possible to carbo load for this?
I'm a little worried that I'll make things awkward...
You're doing great, ~target~!
Consider this your warm up before the real training begins.
I'm liking this result.
She's so ferocious. I don't think I can handle that...
